section.title: Traffic flow on highways in California
section.para:
In the first case, there is no showCode attribute and so it is shown or not depending on the value of showCode.
summary(rnorm(100))
But this next one will "always" show the code, regardless of the global XSL variable/parameter showCode:
summary(rnorm(100))

Now set it to false.
summary(rnorm(100))

Now set invisible to true.
summary(rnorm(100))

Now set eval to false.
summary(rnorm(100))
